body_content.explanation: the reporting of a particular important event or subject:
examples: What did you think of the BBC's election coverage?
Live coverage showed the team celebrating after the game.
There was very little media coverage of the event.
Keep up to date with our latest news coverage.
The case has attracted a huge amount of press coverage.

body_content.explanation: the fact of dealing with or directing attention to something:
examples: These books give very good grammar coverage (= they deal with grammar very well).

body_content.explanation: financial protection so that you get money if something bad happens:
examples: If you are making major changes to your home you should check your insurance coverage.
There is no coverage for expenses under $5 000.
Companies should be required to provide mental-health coverage.
The insurer has the right to deny coverage.
